name: Paws and Claws: Pampered Pets
detailed_description:
Only the best for your pets! Luxury and extravagance are the way of life at the Pampered Pets Spa. Let the pampering begin!

Features

  • Time for TLC! Welcome your clients to your Pampered Pets Spa to style and spoil your pets.
  • Bling! Create custom diamond collars, sequined bags and more in your very own Pet Shop.
  • Posh pad! Welcome your VIPets to their very own luxurious themed room including the Pretty in Purple and You’re a Movie Star rooms.
  • Secret to Success! Grow your Pet Spa business as you receive gold star recommendations from your satisfied customers.
  • Spare No Expense! Expand your custom treatments such as water aerobics and acupuncture in the Wellness Center.
  • Pamper your VIPets with nothing but the best treatments including massage therapy and oxygen tents.
  • Become the star of the business welcoming your guests with a limo ride from the airport.
  • Offer your Pet Spa customers posh accessories and lavish personal pet rooms.

short_description: Only the best for your pets! Luxury and extravagance are the way of life at the Pampered Pets Spa. Let the pampering begin!Features Time for TLC! Welcome your clients to your Pampered Pets Spa to style and spoil your pets. Bling! Create custom diamond collars, sequined bags and more in your very own Pet Shop. Posh pad!
reviews:
“Parents need to know that this game is designed for young kids who are interested in dogs and cats. It gives kids the opportunity to interact with virtual animals...to pet, play fetch, and feed them, and provides interesting information about their behavioral patterns. What's more, the game teaches the basics of managing a pet grooming business by rewarding players with money that needs to be reinvested to build more attractions, buy more food, and attract more customers.”
Common Sense Media

pc_requirements.minimum:
• OS: Windows® XP/Vista
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz Pentium®
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® compatible video card; GeForce 3 (or equivalent) with 64 MB VRAM (Note: the title does not support GeForce mx based video cards)
  • Display Monitor with screen resolution of 1024x768 pixels
  • Hard Drive: 600 MB of free space on hard drive
  • Sound: Sound card compatible with DirectX

developers: dtp – young entertainment Gmbh & Co. KG
